website_summaries.verdict: If you like the idea of a vacuum blackhead remover but don't want to spend a lot of money, this model comes with the extras you'll need along with a low price.
pros: This affordable vacuum blackhead remover kit delivers decent suction and comes with three probes for use on different areas of the face
Can be used on other blemishes, like pimples
cons: May not work on tough blackheads
Not ideal for sensitive skin, as it may leave red marks or bruises

customer_reviews.title: Black head remover
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I expected much less since it was so reasonably priced. It arrived fast. Came in a nice box that everything fits neatly back in-for storage. And best of all it worked. It actually sucked out the black heads and white heads (sounds disgusting, but it is exactly what I needed) You can feel the suction tightening your skin as it works. Super happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: momof2boys

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fit in every day routine!
customer_reviews.text: I use it right after the shower every other day. My pores are MUCH cleaner and seem ALOT smaller. This is a much faster (and less damaging) way to maintain clean pores. I HATE cleaning my pores and this is the easiest was. The suction is very very strong. I never need to use the max strength. I also like that I can use it directly under my eyes. It’s helped my skin the most in this area. I hate caked concealer under eyes.. it looks awful on me. I love this thing! I’ll be getting one for my boyfriends daughter. She has a lot of trouble extracting acne.
customer_reviews.author: AJ S.

customer_reviews.title: HOLY CRAP (not a good holy crap)
customer_reviews.text: It got blackheads out but holy crap, no heads up for people with sensitive skin. it looks like I got beat up! How am I gonna explain this!
customer_reviews.author: Clinia M. Saffi

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for power this is the product for you. This has great suction, great battery life and the sponges are super easy to replace, plus it simple and quick to open and clean th top/attachments. Would recommend to anyone looking for a strong suction face vacuum :)
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Not only cleans your face, but makes it look more plumped the next day, and lasts for a week. Something about lifting your dermis does the trick I guess.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this for her whiteheads. After multiple attempts, (and following the instructions carefully) she gave up because the product failed to extract any whiteheads - if anything, it has made her whiteheads more pronounced now. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rob M.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had of purchased sooner in life! Great suction and I used level 2&3, didn't redden my skin, and removed so much gunk out of my pores I couldn't believe it..eew, lol! I used the Lonove facial steamer 1st to open my pores and after vacuum, I used Aztec clay mask , Simple soothing toner, then moisturized. My skin is so soft, clear, glowing, pores tighter, skin not tight/dry and just overall better. I will look forward to my new facial regime and even my hubby wants me to do his facials after he saw my results. Have used twice so far.
customer_reviews.author: MsSweetJames

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product may seem very good but do not be fooled! I used this blackhead remover and it was absolutely useless! Not only did it not help to clean my pores like it said it would but the suction from product did nothing more than make my skin red. Do not waste your money on this false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: min

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get this if you have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin so I followed the instructions carefully. Used this total of two times . It left bruises around my nose and chin on the lowest setting. It also barely suctioned any blackheads. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Does not live up to the information and quality before purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work correctly and is quoted as being three speeds which is a lie only one speed. I am very dissatisfied and would like a replacement or my money back to buy a different brand. I would not recommend this product looks good but that is where it all ends, poor quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Carroll Miller

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Totally disappointed because I was really excited about this product and the reviews make it seem great, but even after exfoliating and steaming my face for 15 minutes, this did not seem to have any affect on my blackheads/pores (except it did leave a large bruise on the bridge of my nose).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the others..for a little machine it has a lot of power!! I was amazed with how much nastiness came out if my pores when I used this! It’s very powerful and can leave red marks if you turn up the suction too much. You have to steam first, otherwise it doesn’t do much. But after steaming, this things gets all kinds of nastiness out of your pores.
customer_reviews.author: Allen&Katie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The amount of gross it pulled my face is extraordinary. I'll save the graphic details. Get one you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Heaton

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing but for certain skin types
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because I have a lot of acne and big pores. I tried this product and it was amazing!!!! It helped with my acne and made my pores less noticeable. My boyfriend on the other side has very tiny pores to being with and did not get as amazing of results, though he did get some dead skin cells removed when we used the highest setting. That is why I rate it a 4/5 because its not for everyone. Definitely wash and exfoliate your face before to help open up the pores. I recommend washing your face after and using a good moisturizer too.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was SO excited for this product, and SO disappointed. The suction is very strong, but even after steaming my pores, it didn’t pull out very much. Also, I used it other parts of my face than my nose and that skin broke out and developed a touch texture for the next few days. It is also WAY too easy to bruise your skin anywhere but your nose. Not worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Grey

customer_reviews.title: Hickies
customer_reviews.text: These were great but remember if you leave these on your skin for more than a few seconds hickey marks appear so don't like let it sit on your skin for a long period of time at once take it off every couple seconds because like I said you'll have red spots all over your face like hickeys and it takes a day or two for it to go away if you leave them on too long but it does suck out very well
customer_reviews.author: Redders

customer_reviews.title: Works as described!
customer_reviews.text: This blackhead remover truly works! I use it daily on the 3rd setting which I attained gradually because of its powerful suction capabilities. Since I have very oily skin I usually get some residue out without steaming my face first. After use my skin feels much cleaner and smoother. I also believe the circulation in my skin has improved. Now all I need to do is steam my face beforehand to see what results I can achieve! I highly recommend this product for those who suffer from oily skin and blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully, so simple & insane low price
customer_reviews.text: I am still in shock over the quality vs. low low price ! I figured what the heck ... I will buy this for my teenaged sons and at this price no big loss if it doesn’t work. Well it WORKS great just as the video implied. So easy it’s unreal. I love it for my face as well to get the circulation activated. Now all four of us fight over it and I need to buy a couple more it seems. I am beyond thrilled with this product
customer_reviews.author: Gina Cataldo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Suction
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Product as described. shipped quickly. Recharges fast and simple. Holds charge well. Durable Excellent Purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zeru

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: I received this blackhead remover very quickly. Its quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Doby

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This device is AWESOME in every way. It cleans my pores out like no other and i only have to use the first or second speed depends how dirty and clogged my pores are. The day i received the product it was fully charged and ready to use! I love this device and now i cant imagine it not being apart of my routine when it comes to skin care! I would recommrnd this product to anyone! A definite 2 thumbs up from this chic. The result i see on my face is truly amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Calkins

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin and this has helped me a lot with my pores. I use it twice per week on 3 power.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: good product will recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have used this instrument to remove blackheads for more than a week. Now let me share with you my feelings after using it. First, the packaging of the goods is exquisite, and the quality of the instruments is very good. The 2nd although the step that USES a bit cumbersome, but hold to still can have effect down. After the 3rd washing must remember timely close pore. Thank you. I like this instrument very much. i will recommend it to friends
customer_reviews.author: Buck Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Blackhead Remover
customer_reviews.text: Actually works quite well. Use once a week and suction always picks up something. Don't know whether pores are shrinking, but overall my nose looks a lot better from blackheads. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jim P.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I used it last night. It’s really effective to use this blackhead and it looks much cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: good, but can leave a mark
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting one of these for awhile so I had researched them a lot. It works great, but does leave marks if you have sensitive skin like me. Wasn't a big deal, i expected it. Within a day or two it was gone and my skin felt great!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The product does exactly what it’s suppose to. The suction can be very strong and leave marks if it’s held on one spot for too long. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Moe

customer_reviews.title: loved it
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this. I bruise easily and was a bit worried it would bruise or pull at my skin too much. It doesn’t. It has different suction levels that work for everyone. I wouldn’t do it right before I had to be someone because my skin gets a little red, because it’s so sensitive. The redness fades after a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I followed directions exactly and since I have large pores I was excited for great results. Instead, my pores were still visibly clogged and it left my skin red and blotchy, which supposedly is normal but no thanks! Back to Biore strips I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good suction, instructions difficult to follow
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only used it a couple times so far, but it seems to do its job. It has great suction and the first time we used it on my teenage daughter’s nose, we were able to suck out a lot of gross!! It’s definitely easy to use. My only complaint is that the instructions are difficult to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni M.

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it does. The only thing is that I have to use it at night and apply a cream after so I wouldn''t have red spots in the morning. You can''t keep it too much in one place otherwise you will have marks no matter what you do after. I do like it and use it quite often, my husband too. Recommend it if your face is as greasy as mine.
customer_reviews.author: Haines Abdelkerim

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work for me. Suction is powerful but hurts the skin with little results to show for it. Would not recommend. The strips are definitely better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great suction power
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son that has bad acne. It obviously didnt completely clear his face up but it has improved his face alot. The suction power is amazing. It is super easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nakoa Scott

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a minute - read update
customer_reviews.text: I got this yesterday and was excited to use to, but after about a minute it stopped working, the screen was dark, So I thought the battery was dead. I changed it for a few hours and it still does not work. Update - They sent me a new one and it works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Devon G-bom

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I use only once a month for now very powerful.
customer_reviews.author: nowakowski

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Inside everything is intact and works. Looks beautiful and minimalistic. There are 3 speeds. Powered by battery, there is a usb charging without a unit! In action met expectations, cleans well, recommend product and seller
customer_reviews.author: Albert Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Clean pores
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this. I had no idea how much gunk gets in your pores. The different size heads on it are great for different areas of the face.
customer_reviews.author: Fern Conaway

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: It leaves red marks Does not suck any dirt out Just rips your skin off
customer_reviews.author: Ajola

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a year and a stopped working. I would recommend spending a little more for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: We love this, our red faces make us feel like we just been to professionals.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Voyles

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Just didn’t have the suction power I was hoping for. (charged it for a few hours)
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for face hickies
customer_reviews.text: Sucks very hard, slightly painful, but definitely works, as long as you wash your face with hot water first to open your pores. Also, if you have sensitive skin like me, it will leave your face red for hours, so do it before bed, not before leaving the house!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This product is good. It did leave red bruise like marks on my face from the suction. Took out some of my black n white heads but not all on the first time will try again in a week to see if more comes out
customer_reviews.author: Jushley Kekahuna

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I used it once and it stopped working . Not happy would like a whole new one
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: nice.
customer_reviews.text: The product quality is very good, the logistics is very fast, consistent with the seller's description.
customer_reviews.author: Diane ReyesHull

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the other reviews with bruises left me scared to try it on full force, but the lower two settings do not work for me to remove any blackheads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hope you will like the pore vacuum as I do
customer_reviews.text: This blackhead remover vacuum can be both very gentle and very powerful in getting oil and dirt off the skin, just make sure not to leave it on one area for a long time and to keep moving it around. I could see from the beginning that the oil from my skin gone, which was quite impressive in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Little Fenton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product, the suction is good but not too much where it could leave a bruise on your face. Instructions are easy to follow, comes with multiple attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Luz a.

customer_reviews.title: Gets All The Gunk
customer_reviews.text: The suction power on this thing is pretty good. I only use it on level 1 and it gets all the grime from my pores to make my face feel nice and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Hina

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Cleans very effectively, removes blackheads without pain or torturing your skin!
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: This really doesn’t help with anything. If you have problematic skin, see a medical esthetician or dermatologist.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my sister in law. She loves it, the adjustable suction thingy is what she loves the most as she has really sensitive skin. Others dont offer that.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander B.

customer_reviews.title: Works really good!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It works really well. I suffer from acne and I used this once and it already looked clearer in my eyes. Also, don’t let it sit on one spot it will bruise from suction. Use back and forth motions. I hope this helps someone!
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Might as well just use some baking soda and water, that works. The suction sucked. Emailed the company that made it and got no reply.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great suction
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old is still trying to figure it out. The suction power is pretty good. Instructions were kind of vague. Still too soon to know if it's working. But for the price we can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: starsGreat product for oil/acne-prone skin
customer_reviews.text: This electric skin cleaner blackhead extraction tool owns wireless design. With USB charge cable, one time charge can support superior standby time.Best pore vacuum for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker Astrid

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Used as soon as it came in and it works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Barajas

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work. It says no longer than 3 seconds over one area but nothing come out. Just gives you red marks. Even on highest suction.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bolt

customer_reviews.title: Powerful suction
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice blackhead remover, it has 5 suction level which will help to clean pore. The suction level goes from 1 to 5 and has a digital display for better adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really work.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get much out. No noticeable improvements in my skin. Not sure that this is too different from trying to pick at my skin with a metal head.
customer_reviews.author: Sellshop

customer_reviews.title: Not enough suction
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last long after two moths it was garbage . Terrible quality . Suction power not great
customer_reviews.author: Nana20

customer_reviews.title: Read Directions
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Just read the directions on how to properly use it first so there isn't any bruising.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Bell

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Very suprised! Did not read instructions first so didnt steam face it pulled a TON of gunk out. Looking back I wished id started w a face steam but this thing is very cool.
customer_reviews.author: jade herrell

customer_reviews.title: Adios, bitchachooosss
customer_reviews.text: This actually works. Just steam your face before. Idk what the rest of you clowns are complaining about. It didn't even bruise my face.
customer_reviews.author: Demetria

customer_reviews.title: Works but it’s not the best
customer_reviews.text: It works only if I exfoliate beforehand, also, I can’t use it for a long time because it’ll leave bruises.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Don’t past it in the same spot again and again
customer_reviews.text: If you pass it in the same spot again it will leave a mark that like a hickey
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. My son and I have both tried using the pore vacuum after taking a shower. It did remove a little bit of buildup but there are still blackheads visible on his nose after 3 uses. He also complained it made his nose sore.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product serves it purpose! Use the lowest level because the suction is very strong!
customer_reviews.author: CarlaDC

customer_reviews.title: Does little to nothing
customer_reviews.text: This did not suck any of my blackheads up. Disappointing. Higher suction levels left bruises on my face. Do not recommend. I tried several times but it didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: PinkMath

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin!!
customer_reviews.text: Very bad, I got red marks all over my face and it did not take out my blackheads
customer_reviews.author: Jessy A.

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use. Once you steam your face with a hot towel it works great! Absolutely love having a cleaner, clearer face!
customer_reviews.author: mark miller

customer_reviews.title: Works but doesnt come with everything advertised
customer_reviews.text: It worked well but it would have been nice to get all of the things I paid for. Instead of getting 5 suction heads I got 1. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Seeing as how I got this at the end of January and just now had to charge it and realized it won’t hold a charge at all now. I wouldn’t recommend buying it. Now I can’t even return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Product quality is very good the transport speed of logistics is also very quick can easily wash the black head after the beauty shop to remove the black head.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Tran

customer_reviews.title: Good value, really works!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Easy to use but takes some practice. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Busse

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Product came in on time but it was defective. It was left on charge for quite a bit and still didn’t turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Ruchie McGrady

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The best investment ever! I have struggled for so long with my skin, hopefully this will do me any justice lol
customer_reviews.author: Mayelin Espinal

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister's birthday and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 recommend. I followed the instructions and after the first try, my blackheads are gone!
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Wash and moisturize your face before you use it so it glides a lot easier on your skin
customer_reviews.text: Even if you don’t have bad acne I suggest you use this!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley n Cox

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. Can’t really say I see it pulling much out
customer_reviews.author: Ciera

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing!! It works and it is not painful! I used a stick remover before and that hurts. This one works very well! Good.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Jon

customer_reviews.title: exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: When I first used this remover, I was not impressed and thought I would have to return it. I decided to try it again, this time after a long hot shower. This time it worked amazing! I have been using the remover once a week in a nice steamy bathroom after a hot shower and following up with a micellar cleanser and my skin has been amazing. Definitely do not discount the steaming prior to using this remover!
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi W

customer_reviews.title: Great for a bruising.
customer_reviews.text: Two thumbs down. Wow. I turned my bathroom into a sauna and gave my pores a good 30 minutes to open up before trying this thing. Lowest suction and after 20 minutes my face is purple, and my mom just asked me why my face is all bruised. Got the whiteheads out of my nose, but not my chin or cheeks. So, apparently it can clean your nose, but at what cost? And to think it suggests level 4 suction for oily skin? My face is already purple. Not red. Not irritated. Purple. Run the other way.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Last Resort
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a last resort for an extremely stubborn blackhead I have had for over a year. The suction on this thing is powerful, so be careful and read the directions but it sure gets the job done. The blackhead I removed was located on my lip and it did the trick. I think I am going to use this product on my nose on a more of a preventive measure.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen S.

customer_reviews.title: Returning it, does not work with us.
customer_reviews.text: The wife bought it because of what the item promised, remove blackheads from skin. However it does not do that, we followed the instructions that comes with it, leaving our faces on warm water for a couple minutes so our pores open, and then use it to remove all the crap that our skins absorb. It does do a shallow peeling, but it does not remove Blackheads!
customer_reviews.author: Henrique Ellrich

customer_reviews.title: Don't risk your capillaries
customer_reviews.text: This isn't recommended by dermatologists. I tried this and now understand why that is. I'm not paying 30 dollars to go and fix the broken capillaries this can create for $600+ dollars. do your research.
customer_reviews.author: amber K

customer_reviews.title: How is this FDA approved?
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it’s FDA approved because it’s safe..? Its most certainly not because it’s effective. Ive attempted to use this product several times after using hot steam to open my pores... total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: CLu

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this - doesn’t work like in the YouTube videos . It was a disappointment and if you happen to leave the auction in 1 place to long you will get mini bruises .
customer_reviews.author: Eon

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says! Totally cleaned my face. I can already tell my pores are shrinking! I wouldn't have believed it unless I tried it. Just buy one but be careful the suction is very powerful and will leave bruises and draw blood. Follow the instructions, k?
customer_reviews.author: Mendz13

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and good quality
customer_reviews.text: It is very powerful even on the lowest setting. Definitely be careful not to overuse. Prep the skin first!
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: This gets a lot of stuff out of my pores. Too soon to know if it will make long term improvement.
customer_reviews.author: LHP

customer_reviews.title: Poreless skin atlast
customer_reviews.text: I've had best luck cleaning pores in the morning after a shower. Your skin will get used to it and stop bruising after a couple times, be sure to let it heal before trying again.
customer_reviews.author: Tidalsquee

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great but make sure you use a steamer before hand to really open up your pores-it worked great for me on my nose!
customer_reviews.author: Navygirl

customer_reviews.title: It was OK but a little overrated. I was expecting something with all a lot more suction.
customer_reviews.text: It was OK but a little overrated. I was expecting something with all a lot more suction.
customer_reviews.author: IamPlayfulStyles On IG

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This device works really well. It definitely does its job to clean out your pores. The suction works well and the machine is fairly quiet. All in all I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tara B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and painless!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, finally found something that took out my daughters stubborn black head and it was painless! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Macias

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea ..if it would work
customer_reviews.text: Horrible ..wish I returned it but it’s a bit late l. don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: works great, very strong suction so be careful you don't give yourself a "hickey" pores are looking so much better.
customer_reviews.author: aubie

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: i read reviews on this product before I purchased. They did not lie! I love this product. It works so well. I just use it after I get out of the shower. As most other reviews say, read the instructions so you do not damage your skin. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Burkhart

product_meta.title: Blackhead Remover,COOFO Blackhead Vacuum Suction Remover Pore Vacuum Extractor Tool Blackhead Remover Makeup Residues Facial Skin Removal Extractor Tool Skin Facial Pore
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY:Latest upgraded blackhead remover has the capability of stronger suction and deeper cleansing of the skin. After tests implemented by clinical technology,innovative vacuum technology will not harm your skin,can effectively remove blackheads,whiteheads,dead skin,grease and makeup residues,smooth wrinkles and tighten skin.A prefect and useful item for your family and friends.

5 LEVELS OF SUCTION POWERS :The light suction (level 1 and level 2) suitable for sensitive and dry skin. Please use it with the small-hole beauty probe for the first time. The medium suction (level ) is for neutral skin. The high suction ( level 4 )is for oily skin, and the strongest suction level 5 is designed for mixed skin with large pores.

4 REPLACABLE HEADS:The 4 replaceable beauty heads including 2 x large circular hole head for strong suction,can be applied to blackheads and V face ;1 x Oval hole head for enhanced nose blackhead removal,suitable for canthus, the corner of mouth and other areas where easy to have fine lines to prevent the growing of wrinkles ;1 x Small circular hole head with gentle suction for sensitive skin area.

LED DISPLAY AND LONG STANDBY TIME: LED display can easily show you the remaining power and suction level on the screen. High quality lithium battery which can used for more than 180 minutes after fully charging, convenient to carry it for travel.
GUARTEE :24 hours professional service team, 45 days full refund, 36 months guartee and lifetime after-sales ervice, worry-free purchase from SROCKER.If there are any problem,please let us know.
